name: Hidden Shapes Old West - Jigsaw Puzzle Game
name_original: Hidden Shapes Old West - Jigsaw Puzzle Game
description:
Disconnect yourself from the world with another beautiful game from the "Hidden Shapes" series!

This time inspired by the Old West, you'll relax and have fun solving the jigsaw puzzles and being amazed by your beautiful art after solving the puzzles!

So that you can have fun and enjoy the game more, after solving a jigsaw puzzle the complete art will be released, so at any time you can have fun again solving the entire puzzle.

- Steam Community

Don't forget to follow us to find out what's new in this game and others!
